newsitem.title: UK: N.Irish policemen arrested in deception probe.
newsitem.headline: N.Irish policemen arrested in deception probe.

text.p: Several police officers and car dealers were arrested in Northern Ireland on Tuesday in a probe into deception and conspiracy, police said.
"Those arrested included a number of serving police officers and car dealers in Counties Tyrone and Fermanagh," the Royal Ulster Constabulary (RUC) said in a statement.
The arrests resulted from a 15-month investigation by a police team under a detective superintendent that had spread to a number of towns in the British province, the RUC said.
"Police this morning have arrested a number of people in an investigation into serious offences included deception and conspiracy to pervert the course of justice," it said.
"The arrests follow a protracted inquiry by a special team of detectives that involved a number of towns throughout Northern Ireland."
